Posts.EditableText: Hi hope everyone is of fine health. Just hopefully a quick question. In my new game in 5.4 if by mistake I do a typing error eg instead of typing (look river) I type in look rivr, instead of saying (I don't understand you) it comes up with a statement (Error running script: Too few parameters passed to ShowMenu function - only 3 passed, but 4 expected). Hope you understand this. It seems to match up to the objects that I am using. Thanks terry Happy Adventuring
Posts.HTML:
Hi hope everyone is of fine health. Just hopefully a quick question. In my new game in 5.4 if by mistake I do a typing error
eg instead of typing (look river) I type in look rivr, instead of saying (I don't understand you) it comes up with a statement
(Error running script: Too few parameters passed to ShowMenu function - only 3 passed, but 4 expected). Hope you understand this. It seems to match up to the objects that I am using. Thanks terry Happy Adventuring

Posts.EditableText: Have you updated to the latest version? That sounds like a bug in the original 5.4 release, which Alex quickly fixed.
Posts.HTML: Have you updated to the latest version? That sounds like a bug in the original 5.4 release, which Alex quickly fixed.

Posts.EditableText: Hi Jaynabonne hope you are well. No I hadn't. Yes I have now. Yes it works a treat. Thanks a million Terry Happy Adventuring Have a good day. P. S. The reply looks better than being in a box in the centre of the screen.
Posts.HTML: Hi Jaynabonne hope you are well. No I hadn't. Yes I have now. Yes it works a treat. Thanks a million Terry Happy Adventuring Have a good day. P. S. The reply looks better than being in a box in the centre of the screen.
